message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:

CREATE TABLE wp_wctofb ( id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, product_id bigint(250) NOT NULL, product_status varchar(250) NOT NULL, sync_status int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', activity_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
